title: Mother provider
comment: My son can be difficult when he is facing something new, challenge. As his mother and provider,  I am always looking for something that will assist him in communicating with the rest of the world. Will update as we go but what I see and have experienced personally, I do like the app, already.

title: Exactly what I needed
comment: I'm an introvert, shy, socially awkward, and socially anxious person. I have been working on talking more. I don't want to burden people and take their time, so This app is easy to talk to and gain confidence and familiarity to my voice. I want to make videos or podcasts, so this is good practice for that.

title: Great App
comment: It allows to go through "deliberate practice." Really simple to use. Love it.

title: Great job
comment: Thanks

title: excellent simple tool
comment: it helps so much in my daily english training.

title: Simply perfect
comment: ...Because it's so perfectly simple. Thank you, genius developer for the creation of this app. It has all I ever need for the purpose of voice training. It's also lightweight and convenient and works without any stutter at all, and I love it exactly because of the simplicity that only enhances the execution of what it sets out to do.

title: Simply perfect
comment: No superfluous buttons or functions.  Just simple, and very clear dictation playback. Solid.

title: Looks great and has has good features,
comment: but due to the (so far unalterable) volume gain on my phone mic, the app shows noise when there is silence, thus auto mode can't function... Maybe this can be fixed?

title: Simple and awesome
comment: A very simple and useful tool to train pronunciation. I loved it!

title: Stops working
comment: Works once, first time, then won't work unless I reboot.

title: Great FOSS app.
comment: Could be named Phrase Trainer, 'cause I use it for practising musical phrases instead of speech. I play a couple of phrases on my instrument and have played back to me so I can hear how it comes across. All hands free, which eliminates risk of dropping my instrument. And it's really free, as in speech.

title: Best app so far
comment: Excellent app for those who want to improve their speech quality

title: Ok
comment: Very useful for those who want to be good speakers.

title: Simple and Good
comment: Great for easily listening to yourself

title: great concept but some problems
comment: I have used this app for 5+ hrs and think its a great tool. However, there are a few limitations.  If you use this where you have any sort of background noise, it does not work properly.  If you speak long sentences really slowly, it plays back the recording before the spoken sentence is complete.  Also, the app does not run in the background.  If you are able to find a quiet place and your goal is speech training for words or short phrases, this is a good choice.  However, in sub optimal environments, and depending on how you plan to do speech training, it might not be the right one.   I prefer EchoHacks Speech Trainer for longer sentence drills.   It is more resistant to background noise, and gives me control how many seconds I want to echo.  I am using both Speech Trainers for different purposes as they have different strength and weaknesses.

title: Broke something
comment: I can no longer use the recording function with any app after tapping «rate» in the menu, being taken here, and tapping the back button to go back.  Uninstalling did not help and neither did restarting the phone.

The problem must have been caused by faulty hardware. The application uses the standard Android library for audio recording, which should never cause such issues (the same library is used by most recording apps on the market).
